name: Shining Girls
description:
Shining Girls is a relaxing puzzle game and multiple unique sexy girls.
Enjoy cute girls in the background of gentle music and complete puzzles.
Swap puzzle pieces to complete levels and unlock more viewing modes.
Watch the full picture after completing the puzzle.
No time limit, you can enjoy the game.



Feature :
Sexy girls pictures & Relaxing music.
Fullview mode after completing a level.
Game with many levels playing with different levels .
